features: Ergonomically Designed - KeaBabies Baby Carrier Wrap evenly distribute your baby's weight for optimal back and shoulder support. It is certified by the International Hip Dysplasia Institute (IHDI) for promoting baby’s healthy hip development.

Nice and Snug - Our baby wraps carrier is made with soft, stretchy, and breathable proprietary fabric tech for a secure fit. Easy to put on, no constant readjustment needed. A great infant carrier for moms and dads who are new to babywearing.

Everyone Can Babywear - KeaBabies Baby Sling Carrier accommodates all sizes. Versatile and sustainable, this baby wearing wrap can be used as a pregnancy support band, postpartum wrap, or nursing cover (refer to our video tutorial or user manual).

Hands-free Bonding - With KeaBabies Baby Sling Wrap, you can bond with your little one while staying hands-free. Stay connected on the go, ensuring both of you are at ease. This infant wrap carrier is one of the must-have newborn baby essentials.

Calms and Soothes - KeaBabies Baby Wrap creates a cozy environment that mimics the womb to make your baby feel calm and secure. This baby holder wrap promotes crucial growth and development in the baby's early months. Ideal child carrier accessories.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Ultimate Babywearing Experience Experience the magic of parenthood with the KeaBabies Original Baby Wrap Carrier. Crafted using our proprietary woven-tech fabric, it ensures unparalleled comfort while nurturing the bond between parent and baby. Create wonderful moments together anytime, anywhere.

Trusted Ergonomic Excellence Endorsed by the International Hip Dysplasia Institute (IHDI) as a hip-healthy product, the KeaBabies Original Wrap Carrier offers exceptional support for your infant's healthy hip development, ensuring comfort and peace of mind during the critical first 6 months of growth. Ease Extended Comfort Discover perfect stretch and support with KeaBabies Original Wrap Carrier's unique stretch technology. It provides optimal stretchability for a secure and snug fit for your baby, while evenly distributing their weight across your back and shoulders. Enjoy extended hours of comfortable babywearing wherever you are. Comfort Breathe Easy Enjoy year-round comfort with the KeaBabies Original Wrap Carrier's premium, proprietary lightweight and breathable fabric. With maximum comfort for both you and your baby, our wrap carrier makes babywearing a breeze, no matter where your adventures take you. Gift Meaningful Gift Delight new parents with the gift of warmth and love. The KeaBabies Original Wrap Carrier is the perfect gift for any occasion, including baby shower. It is a must-have baby essential for your baby registry. Comes with a storage pouch and a kraft gift box that is ready for gifting.

Soothe Extra Soothing Parents who babywear will discover a sweet surprise – that their babies are generally happier. The soothing womb-like environment and the constant gentle rocking while being carried in the KeaBabies Original Wrap Carrier, promote the feeling of calm and safety. KeaBabies Tip: Carrying your baby in an upright position helps expel excess air naturally. It is a safe, great way to relieve colic. Learn Enhances Learning Babywearing strengthens the bond and connection between both of you. Your baby learns from your cues, and having you carrying them snugly close with the KeaBabies Original Wrap Carrier, puts them in the best angle to watch and learn from you. KeaBabies Tip: Babywear regularly to nurture and support your child's healthy growth and development. Bond Hands-Free Bonding Babywearing promotes a calming, healthy bond between you and your baby. With KeaBabies Original Wrap Carrier, you can stay comfortably connected with your baby anytime, anywhere, hands-free. KeaBabies Tip: Breastfeeding is easy with KeaBabies Original Wrap Carrier. Simply tie the wrap carrier lower, and your baby will be able to latch on without removing him/her from the baby wrap carrier.

Specifications Dimensions ‎202.5 (L) x 21.5 (W) inches | 514 x 55 cm Fabric Proprietary Woven-tech Fabric - Lightweight, breathable, all-season Recommended Baby's Weight 7 to 35 lbs Suitable For 0 to 36 months Size One size fits all, XS to 3XL Tutorial Instruction Manual, Video Tutorials Wash Care Machine wash in cold cycle and tumble dry on low Endorsed Baby Carrier Industry Alliance (BCIA), International Hip Dysplasia Institute (IHDI) Methods Regular Hold, Basic Carry, Tandem, Twins, Front, Back, Sling Users Moms, Dads, Grandparents, Caregivers, Educators, Healthcare Professionals, Aunts, Uncles, Siblings Promotes Healthy physical development, parent-child bonding, aids in child's mental development, enhances learning Includes Kraft Gift Box, Travel Storage Pouch Gifting Baby Registry, Baby Shower, Baby Announcements, Pregnancy Gifts, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Any Occasions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used every day for months!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely loved this wrap. I loved it so much, I bought it in a second color and used it daily for months! This was an absolute game changer for my baby that didn’t want to be put down. It allowed me to be hands-free while also enjoying the cuddles. The fabric is thick and durable. I washed it many times and it never lessened in quality. It was super comfortable for both myself and baby. It feels surprisingly supportive- I sometimes wore for hours and didn’t feel sore or uncomfortable. Could easily sit up, stand, and change positions while wearing. While the shoulder part can be moved over to help support baby’s head, I definitely used a hand to support whenever bending over as she could sometimes wiggle out. While it seemed confusing at first, it was easy to learn how to use the wrap. I just watched a quick tutorial online. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and Works Great
reviews.reviewText: I am obsessed with this color (sand stone)! I originally got black but am expecting a baby in April, so figured lighter would keep me and my boy cool in the heat! The material is really soft and feels very lightweight. I had a stuffed animal wrapped to me for an hour because it was so cozy. Easy to use, great option for the price especially.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I could not live without this!
reviews.reviewText: Others say it’s too cumbersome to use, but I promise— stay patient and keep working at it! I got the “easier” D-Lite Kea babies wrap and tbh I prefer this original one. I use both, but this one is more comfortable for both me and baby in my personal opinion.When you’re wrapping it, try bringing it around your body holding each piece by the edge of the cloth so you are minimizing twisting. This is what has made it easier for me to wrap. Just be patient, baby will quiet down as soon as you get her into the wrap! (:My 7 week old loves this thing, if she’s fussy I verify fed+clean diaper+burped and once I get her into this wrap— she’s out like a light! If I want to put her down, I lean over and wiggle her out, quickly lay her down and soothe her if she startles, and that’s it folks— out for the count!During the day I keep her here almost the whole time she sleeps. I clean, cook, do my homework (I’m a full time nursing student and right now taking online classes). I eat hot meals (gotta lean over to take bites but who cares?! It’s a hot meal for mom during the tiny baby stage, it’s a miracle!).My husband was skeptical at first but now he’s a true believer in the baby wrap. He tries to imitate the wrap with his arms when he holds her while I’m putting the wrap on; but he says it’s never going to be like what he calls “mommy’s hug” with the wrap 😂Anyway, I do highly suggest this. I like it a lot better than the ring sling I got, although I think I’ll use that more often along with this one when she’s older. It can get warm, but just adjust the temp. My girl likes it sometimes when I put the fan on us for a bit. She falls asleep even faster with the cool breeze and white noise of the fan, cuddled up tight inside the wrap against my chest. Enjoy!P.S. watch YouTube to see tutorials from the company!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great carrier once you figure it out!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a simple carrier that could help me go hands-free and keep my baby close by. I found the written instructions to be very confusing but after one video I was able to easily use this carrier. It looks intimidating (one VERY long piece of fabric) but is simple, comfortable, and effective!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this wrap! It was confusing to put on at first but once you get the hang of it, its quick and easy! Its long enough that im able to use it until shes older! Ive used it since birth to now a year later! I will say that the material is breathable but if baby runs hot, it will sweat a lot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It works but
reviews.reviewText: My baby is 7months and about 20lbs, he prefers facing forward and I was hoping this would be more comfortable than the regular buckle style carrier. It is a learning curve to get him in it and if you get it perfect is super comfortable but after walking a while it bunches up and feels like its sagging. The fabric is a little scratchy too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product, easy to put on. My baby feels very secure and calm in this. The material is very good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This wrap is super easy to use & comfortable. I have had 2 spinal fusions and my neck is prone to pinched nerves as well, so carrying my 9 month old great niece around in my arms put a lot of strain on my back & neck. This wrap helped distribute her weight appropriately, so I didn’t feel any strain on those usually painful areas. I was able to wear her for hours without pain. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality, love my baby snuggling up to me
reviews.reviewText: This baby wrap is super soft, comfortable and breathable. It may spend few times to get used to wearing but once learned the way, it’s very easy to wrap.One thing I found this baby wrap wins over a baby carrier like ergo baby was its material. The former is way more stretchy, comfortable and more friendly to newborn’s skin. With a small bag, it’s also easier to store and bring out.I began using this wrap since my baby was born and now his 6 month old I’m still using it. I love how baby is close to me, sleeping safe and sound, while I can free both my hands. I definitely think it’s a baby essential.

Le doy 5 estrellas porque el producto en si cumple con su función es de buena calidad, yo vivo en una zona de calor, lamentablemente no pude usarlo porque le genera demasiado calor a mi bebé ya que la tela es un poco gruesa

Das Tuch fühlt sich gut an und ist sehr elastisch. Es ist sehr bequem mein Baby damit zu tragen, sie scheint es auch zu lieben. Eignet sich super für Neugeborene. Fühlt sich sicher an.Das binden ist auch einfach, allerdings habe ich ein Video-Tutorial angeguckt weil ich aus der Anleitung die dabei war nicht schlau geworden, find die nicht so gut.Ich glaub bei umfangreichen Personen reicht das Tuch aber nicht, ich bin recht dünn und bei mir bleibt am Ende nicht viel übrig zum Knoten binden.Man kann noch ein eingerolltes Spucktuch ins Tuch klemmen als Nackenstütze fürs Baby, dann ist es perfekt.
Bon produit qui répond parfaitement à mes attentes. Je recommande
